fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • In giving examples of small plants coming out at this time, we referred to “roux-leaved saxifrage”. The wildflower’s name is the rue-leaved saxifrage (Wildlife recovers as UK stays inside but boom may go unrecorded, 30 March, page 3). • Other recently amended articles include: England and Wales coronavirus death toll 40 higher than previously stated Rightwing thinktanks use fear of Covid-19 to fight bans on plastic bags Lack of testing raises fears of coronavirus surge in eastern Europe Fears over hidden Covid-19 outbreak in Lebanon, Iraq and Syria Housing associations under pressure to offer Covid-19 rent holidays
